title: FT - T206 Cobb Green Portrait (SGC 40) for T205 Hoblitzell No Stats
author: noelbrian55

posts.post_title: FT - T206 Cobb Green Portrait (SGC 40) for T205 Hoblitzell No Stats
posts.post_content: Looking to trade my T206 Ty Cobb Green Portrait for a Hoblitzell No Stats T205.
Would you be interested in trading it for cash?
I’d be open to offers.  Send me an email and I’ll send pics.
